person.persName: James B. Mershon (Pendleton County, Kentucky, blacksmith and soldier/18th Kentucky Infantry)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, blacksmith and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Catherine Mershon. Father of Beckett Mershon and Henry C. Mershon. Blacksmith in Pendleton County in 1860. Corporal and sergeant in the 18th Kentucky Infantry from February 1862 to December 1863.
